summary: To focus more federal funds on counties with persistent poverty, some federal programs have been required to spend at least 10% of their budgets in these counties. A 2019 bill proposes expanding this requirement to more federal programs and proposes spending requirements for high-poverty Census areas. title: Targeting Federal Funds: Information on Funding to Areas with Persistent or High Poverty
